title: Coronavirus: What is the state of play in Europe’s major leagues?
description: When are we likely to see football return in France, Germany, Italy and Spain?
content:
The title battle at the top of La Liga is among the many footballing issues on hold
Football is suspended across most of Europe because of the continued spread of coronavirus.
The game in England is suspended indefinitely and, while Premier League clubs are… [+4614 chars]
